phylogenetic_trees

Source: vignettes/articles/phylogenetic_trees.Rmd
phylogenetic_trees.Rmd
library(taxPPro)
library(ape)
library(data.tree)

Import MetaPhlan tree:

mpaTreeFile <- system.file(
    'extdata', 'mpav31.newick', package = 'taxPPro', mustWork = TRUE
)
mpaTree <- read.tree(mpaTreeFile)
mpaTree
#> 
#> Phylogenetic tree with 12358 tips and 12357 internal nodes.
#> 
#> Tip labels:
#>   1974406, 1974461, 1974451, 1974465, 1974462, 1974449, ...
#> 
#> Rooted; includes branch lengths.

Import living tree:

livingTreeFile <- system.file(
    'extdata', 'livingTree.newick', package = 'taxPPro', mustWork = TRUE
)
livingTree <- read.tree(livingTreeFile)
livingTree
#> 
#> Phylogenetic tree with 16161 tips and 16160 internal nodes.
#> 
#> Tip labels:
#>   576, 451513, 1691903, 1529639, 158852, 379893, ...
#> Node labels:
#>   , 2+48381, , , 57723+533205, 1239+186801+91061+1385+3039167+68295+186814+3039168+539003, ...
#> 
#> Rooted; includes branch lengths.

Import taxonomic tree:

data('tree_list')
dataTree <- as.Node(tree_list)
dataTree <- as.phylo.Node(x = dataTree, heightAttribute = NULL)
dataTree$tip.label <- sub('^\\w__(\\d+)$', '\\1', dataTree$tip.label)
dataTree$node.label <- sub('^\\w__(\\d+)$', '\\1', dataTree$node.label)
dataTree
#> 
#> Phylogenetic tree with 63402 tips and 12062 internal nodes.
#> 
#> Tip labels:
#>   100, 1282440, 1745854, 177413, 184075, 1937790, ...
#> Node labels:
#>   ArcBac, 2, 1224, 28211, 356, 335928, ...
#> 
#> Rooted; no branch lengths.
mean(mpaTree$tip.label %in% dataTree$tip.label)
#> [1] 0.3639748
mean(livingTree$tip.label %in% dataTree$tip.label)
#> [1] 0.8274859
mean(dataTree$tip.label %in% mpaTree$tip.label)
#> [1] 0.07094413
mean(dataTree$tip.label %in% livingTree$tip.label)
#> [1] 0.2109239

It seems that the living tree could be better (more completeness)
